erebor was a hell hound living in northwest Faer√ªn in the 15 century DR, being one of two that were owned by the fire giant Duke Zalto.
Zerebor lived with Zalto, alongside the hell hound Narthor, inside the ancient dungeon complex of Ironslag.
At times the two hell hounds chased around and blasted fire at a hollow iron ball Zalto that would throw around, much to their owners amusement. This ball measured  across, was riddled with holes, and held inside of it the roasted corpse of a rock gnome.
